overview:
Lee Tracey is one of the founding partners of Bath and Unwind the online distributor of Luxury Beauty & Body Care products.

Bath and Unwind offer a wide range of beauty gifts from brands such as: Burt’s Bees, Korres Natural Products, Aromatherapy Associates and This Works. The company specialises in natural beauty gifts, luxury bath products & beauty products for both women and men.
